TI: 3-D diffeomorphic shape registration on hippocampal data sets.
AB: Matching 3D shapes is important in many medical imaging applications. We show that a joint clustering and diffeomorphism estimation strategy is capable of simultaneously estimating correspondences and a diffeomorphism between unlabeled 3D point-sets. Correspondence is established between the cluster centers and this is coupled with a simultaneous estimation of a 3D diffeomorphism of space. The number of clusters can be estimated by minimizing the Jensen-Shannon divergence on the registered data. We apply our algorithm to both synthetically warped 3D hippocampal shapes as well as real 3D hippocampal shapes from different subjects.
AD: Dept. of CAMS, Texas A&M University-Corpus Christi, USA.
TA: Med Image Comput Comput Assist Interv
JT: Medical image computing and computer-assisted intervention : MICCAI ... International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer-Assisted Intervention
SO: Med Image Comput Comput Assist Interv. 2005;8(Pt 2):984-91.
